Hello!
I’m Hayley Hemme and I’m a first-year PhD student at the University of Georgia working with Andreas Handel and his group. Please take a look around to see what I’ve been up to and also check out the Handel Research Group page to learn more about the group.

This website is a work in progress

title: About
text:
Research Interests

Infectious disease dynamics, especially viruses
Mathematical and computational modeling of within-host and population-level dynamics
Epidemiology, immunology, Bayesian modeling, causal inference
